parameters.name: FirewallSwitch
parameters.description:
The status of the NAT firewall. Valid values:

*   **open**: enabled
*   **close**: disabled

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: NatGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the NAT gateway.

parameters.name: NatRouteEntryList
parameters.description: The routes to be switched to the NAT gateway.

parameters.name: ProxyName
parameters.description: The name of the NAT firewall. The name must be 4 to 50 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). However, it cannot start with an underscore.

parameters.name: RegionNo
parameters.description:
The region ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).

>  For more information about Cloud Firewall supported regions, see [Supported regions](~~195657~~).

parameters.name: StrictMode
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the strict mode. Valid values:

*   1: yes
*   0: no

parameters.name: VswitchAuto
parameters.description:
The mode of the vSwitch that you want to use. Valid values:

*   **true**: automatic
*   **false**: manual

parameters.name: VswitchCidr
parameters.description: The CIDR block of the vSwitch.

parameters.name: VswitchId
parameters.description: The ID of the vSwitch. This parameter is required if you set the VswitchAuto parameter to true.
